member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS
member.summary: Defines image filter capabilities for a Microsoft Direct3D 11 video processor.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FILTER_CAPS_BRIGHTNESS
member.summary: The video processor can adjust the brightness level.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FILTER_CAPS_CONTRAST
member.summary: The video processor can adjust the contrast level.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FILTER_CAPS_HUE
member.summary: The video processor can adjust hue.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FILTER_CAPS_SATURATION
member.summary: The video processor can adjust the saturation level.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FILTER_CAPS_NOISE_REDUCTION
member.summary: The video processor can perform noise reduction.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FILTER_CAPS_EDGE_ENHANCEMENT
member.summary: The video processor can perform edge enhancement.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FILTER_CAPS_ANAMORPHIC_SCALING
member.summary: The video processor can perform anamorphic scaling. Anamorphic scaling can be used to stretch 4:3 content to a widescreen 16:9 aspect ratio.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSPR_FILTER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FILTER_CAPS_STEREO_ADJUSTMENT
member.summary: For stereo 3D video, the video processor can adjust the offset between the left and right views, allowing the user to reduce potential eye strain.
